channel.title: writeups on dnx.zone
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on dnx.zone

item.title: [Facebook] Page Admin Disclosure via an Upgraded Page Post
item.description: Been in the bug bounty and/or ethical hacking scene for more than 4 years now and this is my first write-up (I hope you bear with me) since most of the programs I hunt into are not allowing disclosures. I mostly hunt vulnerabilities on Alibaba and other independent/private bug bounty programs. Description Soooo I was posting for a special event that happened in one of my organizationâ€™s pages. I upgraded that post through a prompt message, â€œIt looks like something special happened.

item.title: [Redacted] Multiple Web Application Security Bugs in your favorite Filipino or SEA e-Commerce site
item.description: This platform is considered to be one of the bigshots in the eCommerce industry particularly here in the Philippines and the rest of Southeast Asia. Initially, I thought that such e-Commerce platform didn’t have a bug bounty program not until they were acquired by this startup ‘unicorn,’ thus, making it as one of its assets/acquisitions. Even though such ‘unicorn’ didn’t include it yet in its bug bounty program scope, still, I thought of submitting my findings to them.

item.title: [ASUS] Stored XSS in ASUS Healthcare Subdomain
item.description: I found this vulnerability while poking around the subdomains of ASUS wayback 2018. Such subdomain was still relatively new that time which means that potentially juicy security issues are still an easy catch. If I can remember correctly, this security issue was found when I was on a ‘pisonet’ together with my friends and playing DOTA 2. ðŸ¤£ Description ASUS Healthcare is a health data management platform wherein end users can keep track of his or her self, family, and friend’s health data using the wearable or IoT device they use in place.
